response:
[Opening Scene: Logo of Ola Scooters]

Narrator (Voiceover): "Welcome to the Ola Scooter family, where we bring together the best design, technology, and performance in a scooter."

[Scene Transition: Display of Ola S1 Family]

Narrator (Voiceover): "Introducing the S1 family, featuring the Ola S1 Pro, Ola S1 with a 3 kilowatt-hour battery, and the Ola S1 with a 2 kilowatt-hour battery."

[Scene Transition: Display of Ola S1 Air Family]

Narrator (Voiceover): "Meet the S1 Air family, offering the same great design and technology at a more affordable price."

[Scene Transition: Display of Ola S1 with 2 kilowatt-hour battery]

Narrator (Voiceover): "For those who need a stylish, powerful scooter for city travel, we present the new S1 with a 2 kilowatt-hour battery pack."

[Scene Transition: Display of price]

Narrator (Voiceover): "All this for an ex-showroom price of ₹99,999."

[Scene Transition: Display of purchase and delivery timelines]

Narrator (Voiceover): "Booking starts from 9th February, with deliveries beginning in March 2023."

[Scene Transition: Display of Ola S1 Air features]

Narrator (Voiceover): "The Ola S1 Air comes with a 34L boot space, sculpted seat, grab handle, flat footboard, dual front suspension, and a dual-tone body."

[Scene Transition: Display of Ola S1 Air variants]

Narrator (Voiceover): "Choose from three variants, each with unique specifications to suit your needs."

[Closing Scene: Logo of Ola Scooters]

Narrator (Voiceover): "Join the Ola Scooter family and experience the future of urban mobility."
